string.text: 6h4 Bayonet

First adopted in 1972 for use with AK rifles. Although highly durable, it is much better at thrusting than it is at chopping or slashing.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]30
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]52
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]10
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: NO
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]25% - 40%
NR-40 Scout Knife

Designed officially for utility purposes, the NR-40 lacks in significant cutting power. Unique to the blade is the inverted S-shaped guard made for holding the knife edge-up where it makes up for its shortcomings with considerable piercing ability.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]45
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]55
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]18
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: NO
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]35% - 50%
Hunting Knife

A modern, highly durable hunting knife with a large stainless-steel blade. As it wasn't intended for use in battle, it struggles against combat armors but is ideal for field dressing.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]42
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]71
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]24
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]45% - 60%
Spetsnaz Switchblade

A blade ideal for special forces operators. It is good at piercing armors and dealing massive tissue damage and is often considered the ultimate combat cutlery.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]54
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]78
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]35
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]55% - 70%
M9 Bayonet

A large, multi-purpose knife with a rugged rubber handle and 7-inch blade, officially adopted in 1986. Commonly used by US soldiers as a bayonet.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]48
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]87
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]35
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]65% - 85%
OTs-4 Combat Knife

Developed at the Tula Central Design Research Bureau in the late 80s for the special forces of the Ministry of Internal Affairs. Featuring a serrated blade, the handle is made of polymer and has a distinctive grenade texture.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]52
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]97
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]35
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]75% - 98%
Monolith Blade

These blades are produced in very few numbers by masters of the Monolith faction. Their composition is from an unknown alloy, rumored to be extracted directly from the heart of the Sarcophagus.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]60
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]107
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]35
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]75% - 98%
Kukri

The national weapon of Nepal, the Kukri has a distinct recurve in its blade and serves multiple purposes as a melee weapon and cutting tool.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]65
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]117
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]35
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]75% - 98%
Gerber Tomahawk

A tactical tomahawk, multitool and breaching tool, all-in-one package.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]90
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]137
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]35
Hunting Axe

An implement used for a millennia to shape, split and cut wood, to harvest timber, as a weapon and as a ceremonial or heraldic symbol. The axe has many forms, is versatile and dangerous when used offensively.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]120
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]170
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]24
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Increased Range
Sledge Hammer

A blunt, heavy industrial sledge hammer. Once a tool used to contruct the buildings around us, now used to crush the heads of those squatting inside. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: 120
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: 170
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: 45
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Increased Range
